name: Where is
description:
The background music belongs to Emil "Ace" Macko. All rights reserved by Emil "Ace" Macko.

"Where is" is a puzzle game made for the Rage Fest Gamejam 2020. The game features 6 levels using it's original mechanic. When you press the spacebar, you will change between one of these visibility modes:

- Player

- Walls

- Enemies

The modes are self explanatory. The game was released on September 1st, 2020.

You can download the source, but I never recommend it. (IT'S MESSY)
